body: It left room for doubt. From the talk in p3, they both have known each other for long time, likely grew up together. He seems to want to say the typical "lets get married once all of this is over". In p20, the warrior did call the Hero as her boyfriend. Although, he could've also said that ironically because it's so obvious both likes each other. So, either they could've been couple, or they might be putting the relationship status on-hold. Ah, but in p18 the Hero did think like "it should've been my cock you're sucking" :D | It's difference in value. The Hero believes he must dedicate 100% to mission, so there's no room for romance or having fun in their free time, such as in p9, he tried denying he also lust for her and told himself mission comes first.

so anyone who can read the story tell if the MC and the healer were a couple in the first place? Or they just kinda liked each other and had chemistry but not officially really together? Because in that case then Berserker dude and healer weren't really in the totally in the wrong. BUT that doesn't mean it wasn't a satisfying story.

now that's a good hentai with good story
100/100 no cap

He actually doesn’t have the guts to confront them. The first time he saw them, he tried making excuse like he got casted with illusion or petrification magic, which of course is just his imagination. Then later, he told himself confronting them might cause the party to break up, and he needed their support, so he pretend to not notice anything (although in the end, he can speed run the last stage alone). That is despite them growing distant from him (after all, he’s too single minded on the mission). It’s not mentioned when they started the affair, got the feeling they already got a relationship at p7, although in p20, their talk implied the warrior still hasn’t won her completely. But even from p10, both already grew closer naturally (the warrior actually cared about her rather than only focused on defeating the demons, and they did trust their life to each other).

Healer got horny after seeing warrior having sex then she tempted Hero but he rejected her advance then she went to the warrior that night to give her chastity albeit it's not shown but only mentioned. The night that hero caught them making love is a different night. Hero confronted them and they admitted it then Hero attacked the demon army by himself as sort of a suicide as he can't accept the betrayal of her former lover then that's when he met demon lord who consolidated him then he became the new demon lord and well as husband of the previous demon lord. Well, that's what I understood from the translation machine so I may have errors.
this is a ntr story what readers want

Harry starts blaming the demons for causing him to be a Hero, and the reason why the girl he loved got stolen by other man. He went to kill the Demon Lord, but stopped when seeing she's just a weak little girl, unlike the menace everyone believed she would be. Demon Lord told him, it doesn't matter if she and all the demons are dead; the world still sucks and human are still trash who kills more of their kind. Instead, she accepted him (the first hero who actually cried and hugged her), and while having sex, she offered him to become the next Demon Lord. Even demons are not eternal, and the current Demon Lord is weakening. She told him, no need to worry about becoming evil, or actually no need to bother sorting things into like human are good or demon are evil; the more important thing is to do what you really want. So, he finally threw away that obligation of a Hero forced onto him and become the Demon Lord.

Re-reading it. Harry, the Hero, is obsessed with his mission. Millia, the Sage, probably just followed because she likes him, and Carlos, the Fighter, joined by royal decree. One night, Harry woke up and saw both having sex, and it's not their first time. Since then, Harry keep trying to make excuse to not confront both about their affair, he told himself the mission need them, and he can't risk breaking the party. Actually, Millia herself is tired, she also wants to get intimate, but Harry is always fixated on finishing the mission. It seems like he's the only one who really believe in the cause of the mission. When they arrived before the castle, Carlos suggested they return to prepare, as they're too tired and low on supply. Harry insist they push ahead, so Carlos decided it's time to quit. He's seriously in love with Millia now, so protecting her and their child is more important than a suicide mission.
